roleset.name: run faster than
roleset.note: OUTRUN-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from outrun.01-v)

example.name: slow Brits
example.text: If we cluster together , the redcoats can make an advantage out of it , but there 's not a blessed thing [0] they can do [*T*-1]with two or three of us except [*] chase us , and we can outrun them '' .
